item.title: Read for EARLY Access: MongoDB’s AI Applications Program(MAAP)
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction MongoDB announced MAAP – MongoDB AI Applications Program, designed to help organizations rapidly build and deploy applications enriched with generative AI technology. MongoDB’s AI Applications Program represents a significant initiative within the AI industry. It aims to assist companies in effectively integrating generative AI into their applications. item.title: Finetuning Llama 3 with Odds Ratio Preference Optimization
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Large Language Models are often trained rather than built, requiring multiple steps to perform well. These steps, including Supervised Fine Tuning (SFT) and Preference Alignment, are crucial for learning new things and aligning with human responses. However, each step takes a significant amount of time and computing resources. One solution is the Odd Ratio […]
item.content:encoded:
